name: J-Voice Search
short_description:
NOTICE: If you're facing problem to download "CloudGarden's TalkingJava SDK", try this link: http://cloudgarden.com/TalkingJavaSDK-170.zip. THE NEW VERSION WILL BE AVAILABLE SOON!

J-Voice Search is a voice search tool for Google based on JSAPI and TalkingJava SDK. It lets you search in the Google by your voice.

Version: 1.0.0 (Released at 31-Oct-2012)

Requirements & Installation: Follow the instructions of "READ ME" doc carefully provided with this software.

License:
Freeware. You can use and redistribute this software for free without any modification of the files provided with the software.

Developer:
Syed Aminul Islam
Java & Web Application Developer
Email: aminul.official@gmail.com
Website: www.aminulofficial.tk (or try the alternative URL: https://sites.google.com/site/aminulofficial)
Like me on Facebook: www.facebook.com/AminulOfficial
SourceForge.net Profile: syedaminulislam.users.sourceforge.net

Copyright © 2013, Syed Aminul Islam. All Rights Reserved.
summary: J-Voice Search is a voice search tool for Google for your PC
